item.title: Monday Links #3
item.description: • Asciinema Purely text-based approach to recording terminal sessions. I saw something of this kind on scrimba where you can pause the video and start editing the code on the screen. Asciinema is a better way to post command line sessions or tutorials than writing down zillion commands for copy pasting or a gif without any video controls where someone has to wait for the loop to complete so that they can pickup from where they left.
